name: MSPAReader: Dress Up Friends!
description:
I just felt like fucking around today, so I made a little dress up game with The Most Important Character in Homestuck.

This is still being worked on, I'm just uploading the first working version for people to test out. At the very least, I'm gonna add a bunch more outfits. Please leave comments and feedback, especially if you have suggestions for more clothes to add!
